datastructure.operators

Class Sequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • datastructure.Drawing
      • datastructure.Operator
        • datastructure.operators.Sequence

  • public class Sequence
extends Operator
    This class is the representation of an operation. It takes an array of drawings and draws each of them in the order of the array.
